This includes information such as the site URL, path, secure status (HTTPS enabled), environment variables, the PHP version that is used to serve this site, and more.","inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{},"required":[]},"_status":"enabled"},{"name":"secure_or_unsecure_site","description":"Secure or unsecure the current site by enabling or disabling HTTPS.","inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"shouldSecure":{"type":"boolean"}},"required":["shouldSecure"]},"_status":"enabled"},{"name":"isolate_or_unisolate_site","description":"Isolate or Un-isolate the current site. Isolating means that the site will use a specific PHP version, rather than the global PHP version. Un-isolating removes this isolation and uses the global PHP version for the site.","inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"shouldIsolate":{"type":"boolean"},"phpVersion":{"type":"string"}},"required":["shouldIsolate"]},"_status":"enabled"}],"resources":[{"uri":"herd://sites/information","name":"site_information","description":"Get information about the current project.
